SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (MNG IX_T_CT_ERROR_MNG_04) */ MNG.mac_no, /* 기기번호 */ NVL(SST.SITE_NM,SITE.SITE_NM) site_nm, /* 코너명 */ MNG.CREATE_DATE, /* 발생일자 */ MNG.CREATE_TIME, /* 발생시각 */ SST.SET_TYPE set_place_cd, /* 설치장소코드 */ SUBSTR(SITE.OPER_START_TIME,1,2)||':'|| SUBSTR(SITE.OPER_START_TIME,3,2)||'~'|| SUBSTR(SITE.OPER_END_TIME,1,2)||':'|| SUBSTR(SITE.OPER_END_TIME,3,2) oper_time, /* 가동시간 */ MAC.SERIAL_NO made_seq, /* 제조일련번호 */ '2' cl_cd, /* 전문구분코드(2:중지중) */ COM.CD_NM5 total_cd, /* 집계분류코드 */ SUBSTR(COM.CD_NM6,1,2) std_error_cd, /* 표준장애코드 */ MNG.ERROR_CD mac_error_cd, /* 기기장애코드 */ ERR.ERROR_MSG, /* 장애내용 */ SUBSTR(COM.CD_NM6,3,1) device_id, /* 장치ID */ COM.CD_NM4 error_class, /* 장애구분 */ DECODE(MAC.DES_YN,'1','2','0') DES_board_yn, /* DES보드가능구분 */ '2' IC_card_yn, /* IC카드가능구분 */ '0' EMV_yn, /* EMV가능구분 */ '0' IR_yn, /* IR가능구분 */ '0' RF_yn, /* RF가능구분 */ '0' thumb_print_yn, /* 지문인식가능구분*/ DECODE(MAC.BILL_USE_TYPE, '6', '2', '0') cash_50000_yn, /* 현금5만원권가능구분:6(1,5만원가능)일 경우 2(사용가능), 아니면 0(사용불가) */ 'E' encrypt_state, /* 암호화상태 */ SST.BOOTH_TYPE booth_type, /* 부스형태 */ '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MAC MAC, OP.T_CM_SITE SITE, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR, OP.T_CT_NICE_MAC NMC, (select * from op.t_cm_common where large_cd='1120' and cd_nm2='1') COM, OP.T_CM_SITE_STATE SST WHERE exists ( SELECT PRTY.ORG_CD,PRTY.branch_CD, PRTY.MAC_NO, COMERR.CD_NM3 ERRORCD FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (MNG IX_T_CT_ERROR_MNG_04) */ MNG_IN.ORG_CD, MNG_IN.branch_CD, MNG_IN.MAC_NO, MIN(CD_NM1) PRIORITY FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG_IN ,OP.T_CT_NICE_MAC NMC_IN ,OP.T_CM_COMMON COM_IN WHERE MNG_IN.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG_IN.ORG_CD = '096' AND MNG_IN.branch_CD = '9600' AND (MNG_IN.ORG_SEND_YN IS NULL OR nvl(MNG_IN.ORG_SEND_YN, '0') = '0') AND MNG_IN.SEND_TIME IS NOT NULL AND MNG_IN.ORG_CD = NMC_IN.ORG_CD AND MNG_IN.branch_CD = NMC_IN.branch_CD AND MNG_IN.MAC_NO = NMC_IN.MAC_NO AND NMC_IN.JOIN_CD = '003' AND COM_IN.LARGE_CD = '6500' AND MNG_IN.ORG_CD = COM_IN.CD_NM2 AND MNG_IN.ERROR_CD = COM_IN.CD_NM3 GROUP BY MNG_IN.ORG_CD, MNG_IN.branch_CD, MNG_IN.MAC_NO ) PRTY, /* 우선순위 추출 테이블 */ OP.T_CM_COMMON COMERR /* 우선순위 장애코드 추출 테이블 */ WHERE COMERR.LARGE_CD = '6500' AND PRTY.ORG_CD = COMERR.CD_NM2 AND PRTY.PRIORITY = COMERR.CD_NM1 AND MNG.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.ORG_CD = '096' AND MNG.ORG_CD = PRTY.ORG_CD AND MNG.branch_CD = PRTY.branch_CD AND MNG.MAC_NO = PRTY.MAC_NO AND MNG.ERROR_CD = COMERR.CD_NM3 )
and MNG.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.CREATE_DATE||MNG.CREATE_TIME <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-10/24/60, 'YYYYMMDDhh24miss') /* 테스트는 10분 안기다려요~*/ AND MNG.ORG_CD = '096' AND NMC.join_cd = '003' /* 브랜드제휴 기관코드 */ AND ( mng.org_send_yn IS NULL OR nvl(mng.org_send_yn, '0') = '0' ) AND MNG.SEND_TIME IS NOT NULL /* 통보나간것만. 하정현과장님. 20130705 */ AND MNG.ARRIVAL_TIME IS NULL AND MNG.FINISH_TIME IS NULL AND MAC.ORG_CD = NMC.ORG_CD AND MAC.branch_CD = NMC.branch_CD AND MAC.MAC_NO = NMC.MAC_NO AND MNG.ORG_CD = MAC.ORG_CD AND MNG.branch_CD = MAC.branch_CD AND MNG.MAC_NO = MAC.MAC_NO AND MAC.ORG_CD = SITE.ORG_CD AND MAC.branch_CD = SITE.branch_CD AND MAC.SITE_CD = SITE.SITE_CD AND MAC.org_cd = SST.org_cd(+) AND MAC.branch_CD = SST.branch_CD(+) AND MAC.SITE_CD = SST.SITE_CD(+) AND MAC.MAC_NO = SST.MAC_NO(+) AND MNG.ORG_CD = ERR.ORG_CD AND MNG.ERROR_CD = ERR.ERROR_CD AND NMC.JOIN_CD = COM.CD_NM3 AND MNG.ERROR_CD = COM.CD_NM1
